transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, hello boliye madam.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan boliye madam boliye.
Customer: Ji sir, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko? Tenu bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan boliye madam boliye.
Customer: Haan ji sir bataiye call kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Main ye bol raha tha wo aapka aap bol rahe the call aayega wo call to aaya hi nahi madam.
Executive: Sir wo jab process apna start hoga to wo automatic call karenge aapko.
Customer: To kab karenge madam?
Executive: Sir abhi to ye mujhe nahi pata lekin aa jayega ek do din mein.
Customer: Ek minute aise line par rahiye aap sir.
Customer: Aisa fix time kijiye madam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Aisa fix time bataiye fix time ki wo time pe call aayega.
Executive: Sir fix time to sir aap unki chinta mat kariye aapke paas jab call aayegi to wo aapse time mangenge.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aap wo apne according apne according aapko call nahi karenge wo aapke paas call aayegi aap jab bhi free rahenge jo time aap denge wo time us time pe call aayegi aapke paas.
Customer: Haan to mujhe.
Executive: Aap iski chinta mat kariye ki hamare according ho raha hai.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: 4:30 baje se aage aana chahiye.
Executive: Haan to jab bhi aap unko time denge tab aayega sir wo na alag team hoti hai aur hamari jo hai wo alag team hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To wo aapke paas call degi sir wo aapke paas call aap uski chinta bilkul mat kariye wo aayegi aapke paas call jab bhi aap bolenge us time jo aap time denge.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: 4:30 denge, 4 denge, 3:30 jo bhi aap time denge wo usi time pe aayegi.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ji aur aap bataiye sir kuch lead yaha pe mere paas ek ticket open hua tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Us lead pe aapne not relevant mark kara tha.
Customer: Kon se?
Executive: Not relevant mark kara tha sir aapne.
Customer: Kisko madam?
Executive: Kai sare isme bata rahe hai ek minute ye aloe vera neem face wash hai jo.
Customer: Haan ye dekhiye madam.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan IndiaMART open kar diya madam maine.
Executive: Haan to ye ek char tarikh ko ek aloe vera neem face wash mein tha to inko aapne not relevant pe mark kara tha.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute madam.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Haan kisko kiya tha madam ye irrelevant mark?
Executive: Sir jaise lead aati hai to not relevant mark karte hai na jab lead aati hai to.
Customer: Achcha lead manager mein jaoge madam?
Executive: Nahi nahi buyleads mein jab hum jate hai to not udhar.
Customer: Not relevant ka option aata hai na sir buyleads mein.
Customer: Relevant ka option aata hai madam not relevant ka nahi aaya.
Executive: Haan delete ka jo delete upar delete ka sign bana hua hota hai not relevant to waha pe aapne na wrong wrong matlab wrong category mein aapne not relevant kar diya hai to kya ye aloe vera neem face wash mein deal nahi karte aap hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi madam nahi nahi madam usme nahi.
Executive: Achcha theek hai aur isme bhi same sir aapne yahi kara hai miracle cutting close type typing oil.
Customer: Aapne product ki category puri chemical hai hair and skin.
Executive: Sir change karna hai?
Customer: Hair and skin chemical hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha theek hai aur ye water.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Cosmetics talcum powder hai aur bahut sara hai sir bahut sare products mein aapne not relevant to isko sabko hatana hai.
Customer: Wo product mein apan deal nahi karte madam.
Executive: Ayurvedic hair oil?
Customer: Nahi nahi usme bhi nahi karta.
Executive: Achcha in sabko aapne hataya theek hai ujala supreme hai tulsi drops hai.
Customer: Nahi usme bhi usme bhi nahi karte madam.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Herbal hair oil hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi usme bhi nahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai fir theek hai fir isko hata dete hu fir main aapke catalog se bahut sara products sabse pehle isme ko not relevant mark karna padega.
Customer: Hmm ye sab nahi hai to.
Executive: Theek hai fir nahi aayega aapke paas ke liye.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir abhi humne aapka jo profile hai usko share kar diya hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Call aayegi aapke paas fir uske baad do teen din se order OVP hota hai order verification process.
Executive: Theek hai sir deal aapka jo price aapko humne diya tha wo price pe unke site pe jaake check hoga fir uske baad deal okay hogi fir aage process mein jayega fir aapke paas call aayegi video KYC hogi uske baad tab jaake kam se kam che din saat din lagta hai fir aapka jo TrustSeal hai wo live ho jata hai.
Customer: To che saat din mein live ho jayega madam?
Executive: Ji haan lekin sir aap ye ye mat sochiye ki aapne kal payment kara hai to kal se count hoga nahi kal se count nahi hoga.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Aapne jo aap aapka jab TrustSeal jis din se live hoga us din se count hoga aapka date.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Ji ji to aapko koi loss nahi hoga kisi bhi ka koi matter nahi hai madam haan.
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Hello wo counting ka koi tension nahi hai sirf wo jaldi se jaldi live ho jana chahiye.
Executive: Haan lekin sir dekhiye ab hum hamare hath mein to nahi hota hai na bas ek ek ek hi company to nahi hai sir jo jinhone basic se TrustSeal mein liya ho bahut sare sir daily TrustSeal mein koi na koi convert karata hai na jane kitni company IndiaMART pe to sir sir wo sir line se sabka process hota hai na ek company to hai nahi warna turant ho jata but sir line se hota hai unke paas bhi puri list padi hui hoti hai isliye time lag jata hai thoda but aapke paas call aayegi aap uski chinta mat kariye.
Executive: A sir main ye bol rahi thi agar aap 16520 aur de sakte hai to aapka teen saal ka ho jayega agar aap de sakte hai to.
Customer: Nahi abhi filhal ke liye nahi de sakta main baad me dunga madam.
Executive: Ji abhi filhal nahi de sakta yahi payment maine idhar udhar se borrow kiya hai madam.
Executive: Achcha nahi nahi koi baat nahi jaise main bas ek baat bata rahi thi kyuki hamare paas offer tha na ki 16520 aur de dete to wo ek saal ka 16520 pad raha hai aapko ek saal ka.
Customer: Nahi wo baat barabar hai lekin abhi nahi kar sakte madam abhi aage karenge.
Executive: Achcha theek hai koi baat nahi utna hi hai wo aapke paas do teen din do teen din aaj kal aaj to nahi agar ho paye to kal tak call chali jayegi aapke paas theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive a call as promised.

- Wants a fixed time for the call.

- Marked products as 'not relevant' incorrectly.



Resolution:

- Explained the call scheduling process.

- Clarified the TrustSeal activation timeline and payment counting.

- Agreed to remove incorrectly marked products.

- Explained the Order Verification Process (OVP).

- Informed about an offer for a three-year subscription.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will remove incorrectly marked products.

- Customer will receive a call in 2-3 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, subscription, not relevant, order verification process
